gameObject

Class CurvedPlatform

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameObject.GameObject
      • gameObject.StageFeature
        • gameObject.StationaryPlatform
          • gameObject.CurvedPlatform

  • public class CurvedPlatform
extends StationaryPlatform
    Represents the stage features where Bezier Curves were used

        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the object
        y - The y coordinate of the object
        w - The width of the object
        h - The height of the object
        section - The map section the curve is located in
        xDir - The x direction the curve is facing
